args:
Sarisse and Luca visit the sylvan holy land,
Initio, where an ancient way of living continues
to this day. These old traditions feel alien to the
siblings, who decide to stay on there to learn.
Luca and I have bid a temporary goodbye to\n{player_name} and the Halidom. It began\nas a simple errand...
Sooo... You got any idea what this letter\nsays, Sarisse?
Not a clue. But the elder told us to deliver\nit to Initio if we're already headed to North\nGrastaea.
Initio, the holy land of the sylvan people...\nI wonder what it's like.
It's supposed to be an enormous forest\nthat's old as dirt, protected by a god they\ncall Yggdrasil.
They say it takes the form of a giant tree.\nI'm eager to see it for myself!
That's about all I know. Well, that and how\nthe people there apparently take sylvan\ntraditions REALLY seriously.
Huh. I'm not really big on all that\ntight-laced stuff myself.
Boooo. Well, I, for one, am excited.\nC'mon, let's pick up the pace!
Okay, this forest is a little TOO thick.
If we weren't sylvan, we never would've\nmade it here.
Guess I can understand why this place\nwound up being treated as a holy site.
Ah! Are you one of the Initio natives?
Indeed, I am a guardsman of the verdure.\nIsaac is my name.
And what exactly is a ＂guardsman of the\nverdure＂?
We are tasked with protecting the village\nand Yggdrasil, who watches over the wood.
Sounds pretty sweet! I'm Luca, from\nMyriage Lake, and this is my little sister,\nSarisse.
Our elder asked us to deliver this letter\nto you guys. Mind putting us through to\nwhoever's in charge?
That breeze...it feels amazing! So this\nis the holy land of the sylvans, huh?
Welp! I think my first stop is gonna be\nsomewhere I can get a tall glass of water\nand a nice, hot meal. I'm starving!
Hold. If you would set foot in the holy\nland, you must undergo the rite of entry.
Just to get into the village? Why?\nAnd can I at least grab a snack first?
You may not. And as for why, because that\nis the way of things. If you would enter our\nland, you will abide by our laws.
Sheesh, we ran into a real fuddy-duddy\nfrom the get-go...
GAH! COLD! You c-coulda warned\nme I was g-g-gonna get doused with\nf-f-freezing water...
He s-said the water from the forest springs\nis supposed to c-cleanse the body.\n*AH-CHOO!*
Hey, don't go catching a cold on me now,\nSarisse... *WAH-CHOO!*
Right back at you.\n...Hey, check it out!
We have arrived. Before you stands the\ndivine guardian of the forest: Yggdrasil.
It has watched over this land since time\nimmemorial, changing its form from\ngeneration to generation.
Sylvans flocked to this fertile wood, and\nin time, Initio came to be our holy land.
We live longer than other races, but I\nguess Yggdrasil's been protecting this\nplace for even longer, huh?
Yes. For dragons live longer still than we\nsylvans.
Whoa, whoa. Back up a sec.\nYou're telling me that TREE is a DRAGON?
You did not know? This is the most basic\nof basic knowledge for a sylvan.
I didn't know either. We only heard bits\nand pieces about Yggdrasil and Initio from\nthe older folks back home.
There's hardly anybody in South Grastaea\nwho's actually made the trip up here.
I see. Then even the very heart of sylvan\nhistory is lost to those who have strayed\nfrom the holy land.
When you put it like that, I feel bad. Sorry.
No, do not apologize. There is ample time\nto learn that which you do not know.
Now, you will ask for Yggdrasil's blessing\nto enter our sanctuary.
Kneel and pray. The winds will deliver\nYggdrasil's reply.
On behalf of my fellow natives of Initio,\nand the wood itself, I greet you as family.
Welcome to the sacred forest,\nholy land to all sylvan people.
Phew. We delivered the letter to the boss\nhere. What's next?
Hey, what are those people doing?\nI've never even seen a tool like that!
Yo. Rein it in a little, would ya?
Aha ha ha, sorry. It's just that everything\nhere is so old that it's brand new to me!
No kidding. It's like a page out of a sylvan\nhistory book.
Right? It's weird that this is OUR\nhistory, but it feels like an exotic foreign\nculture. It's hard not to get excited!
Ooh, Mr. Isaac! Thank you again for your\nassistance, putting us in touch with the\nelder!
Just Isaac is fine, and you needn't speak\nso formally. All save the elder are equals.\nThat is the way of things here.
More importantly, I wanted to speak with\nyou about your lodgings during your stay.
Uh, who said we were staying?
Hm? Surely you didn't ferry that letter\nhere without knowing its contents.
Sure did. Our orders were to deliver it,\nnot bust it open all nosy-like. Right, Luca?
It asked that we teach its deliverers of\nthe ancient sylvan ways.
Stay in this land awhile and learn of your\nhistory and culture, and of the traditions of\nyour people.
Yesss! I was super curious anyway.\nLet's get the full Initio experience\nbefore we head back, Luca!
I'm game. Coming here's made it pretty\nclear that I've been looking outwards all\nthis time. I don't know a thing about us.
Then let's get to fixing that.\nOur sylvan education starts now!
